庛字的基本解释

庛
cì
古代犁下端装犁头的一段木头。

庛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cì］
［《廣韻》七賜切，去寘，清。］
耒下端用以接耜的曲木柄。

庛字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庛； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页345第01
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】七賜切【正韻】七四切，?音刺。【玉篇】耕具也。【集韻】耒下岐木也。【周禮·冬官考工記】車人爲耒庛，長尺有一寸。【註】鄭司農云：庛耒下岐。康成謂：庛，耒下前曲接耜。【疏】庛者，耒之面，但耒狀若今之曲杴柄也，面長尺有一寸，古法耒下惟一金，不岐頭。先鄭云：耒下岐，據漢法而言也。康成謂：耒下前曲接耜者，耜謂耒頭金，故云下前曲接耜者也。　又【類篇】才支切，音疵。義同。　【集韻】或作??。

庛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
庛字的起名意思

暂无。

庛
Basic explanation of words
庛
cì
A section of wood on which the plowshare was mounted under the ancient plow.
庛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cì］
["Guangyun" seven gifts cut, go set, clear. ]
The lower end of Lei is used to connect with the curved wooden handle of Lei.
庛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庛; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 345 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Seven gift cuts [Zheng Yun] Seven-four cuts, with sound thorns. [Jade articles] Farming tools also. [Ji Yun] Lei Xia Qi Mu Ye. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The man of the car is Lei Yu, and the length is one inch. [Note] Zheng Sinongyun: Yu Lei Xia Qi. Kang Cheng said: 庛, next to the previous song and then to the next. 【Sparse】The sparse face is the face of Lei, but the face is one inch long and the length of the face is one inch. The only gold under the ancient law is the same as the head. First Zheng Yun: Lei Xiaqi, according to Chinese law. Kang Cheng said: Lei Xia said that the first song will receive the old man, the Lei said Lei tou gold, so the cloud will also receive the first song.　[Classes] Only support cut, sound defect. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or as ??.
庛

庛
Name meaning
Nothing.
cì
сущ. сошник, лемех
车人为耒, 庛长尺有一寸 тележники делали плуги, сошники были длиной в один чи и один цунь
